summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 11 requirements. The dashboard now features the Deep Onyx background with Emerald accents, a Welcome back header, Control Panel with toggles logging to telemetry, Active Plan card with Log Out button, scrolling Telemetry Feed, Team Status card, localStorage authentication preservation, session clearing on logout, Neural Scan transition playing once per session via sessionStorage flag, and standardized Lucide icons in Emerald color. No redundant logos or initializing screens remain in the dashboard.

hallucinated_features.description: Metric cards displaying Total Encrypted Data, Active Sentinel Nodes, and Security Health statistics
hallucinated_features.reason: These metric cards were not requested in the BuildRequest. The request focused on Control Panel, Active Plan, Telemetry Feed, and Team Status cards only.
